entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:30 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -29.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stony Rapids Airport 12:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -29.5°C
Pressure: 104.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -32.2°C
Wind: SE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023
